load!()

[ show source ]

       # File actionpack/lib/action_dispatch/middleware/session/abstract_store.rb, line 120
120:           def load!
121:             id, session = @by.send(:load_session, @env)
122:             @env[ENV_SESSION_OPTIONS_KEY][:id] = id
123:             replace(session.stringify_keys)
124:             @loaded = true
125:           end
